data.enText: a plan or system for doing or organizing sth
a training scheme
a local scheme for recycling newspapers
to introduce/operate a scheme to improve links between schools and industry
data.chText: 推行 / 实施加强学校和业界之间联系的方案

data.enText: Under the new scheme only successful schools will be given extra funding.
data.chText: 在新体制下，只有办得好的学校才可获得额外经费。

data.enText: a plan for getting money or some other advantage for yourself, especially one that involves cheating other people
an elaborate scheme to avoid taxes
the/sb's scheme of things
the way things seem to be organized; the way sb wants everything to be organized
My personal problems are not really important in the overall scheme of things .
data.chText: 从全局来看，我个人的问题并非十分重要。

data.enText: I don't think marriage figures in his scheme of things.
data.chText: 我想，婚姻在他的心目中是无足轻重的。

data.enText: to make secret plans to do sth that will help yourself and possibly harm others
She seemed to feel that we were all scheming against her.
data.chText: 她似乎觉得我们都在算计她。

data.enText: His colleagues, meanwhile, were busily scheming to get rid of him.
data.chText: 与此同时，他的同事在加紧谋划挤走他。

data.enText: Her enemies were scheming her downfall.
data.chText: 她的敌人正密谋把她搞垮。

data.enText: to think or form an opinion about sth
What do you scheme?
‘Do you think he'll come?’ ‘I scheme so.’

ex.enText: Where do you plan to spend your holiday?
We have been planning our trip to Canada for months.
ex.chText: 数月来，我们一直在筹划我们的加拿大之行。

ex.enText: The police are investigating when he began planning his escape and who his accomplices were.
ex.chText: 警方正在调查他何时开始计划逃跑以及他的同谋有谁。

ex.enText: He didn't plan to conceal the truth. He was just too scared at that moment.
ex.chText: 他不是蓄意隐瞒真相的，只是一时害怕。

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指事前仔细筹划、安排。

ex.enText: They had plotted to rob the bank.
Why did the military secretly plot against him?
ex.chText: 为什么军方密谋推翻他？

ex.enText: He plotted to overthrow the government.

synonyms.bx: 通常指秘密策划违法行为或针对某政要、政府的阴谋活动。

ex.enText: The students wanted more time to prepare their exams.
ex.chText: 学生们想要更多的时间来准备考试。

ex.enText: They were busy preparing for their honeymoon.
ex.chText: 他们正忙着准备去度蜜月。

synonyms.bx: 指为将要发生的事情作好计划、安排等。

ex.enText: The conference is scheduled for next Friday.
ex.chText: 会议定于下星期五召开。

ex.enText: His first book is scheduled for publication in October.
ex.chText: 他的第一本书定于10月出版。

synonyms.bx: 指将某事安排在某一时间或日期进行，通常用被动语态。

ex.enText: The evil queen schemed to kill the little princess with poison.
ex.chText: 邪恶的皇后密谋毒死小公主。

ex.enText: He always feels that all his colleagues are scheming against him.
ex.chText: 他总是觉得他的同事们都在算计他。

synonyms.bx: 指为牟取私利而投机取巧或搞阴谋。

data.enText: the/sb's scheme of things
the way things seem to be organized; the way sb wants everything to be organized
My personal problems are not really important in the overall scheme of things .
data.chText: 从全局来看，我个人的问题并非十分重要。

data.enText: I don't think marriage figures in his scheme of things.
data.chText: 我想，婚姻在他的心目中是无足轻重的。

tr: an elaborate and systematic plan of action
an internal representation of the world
an organization of concepts and actions that can be revised by new information about the world
a statement that evades the question by cleverness or trickery
a group of independent but interrelated elements comprising a unified whole
example: a vast system of production and distribution and consumption keep the country going

tr: form intrigues (for) in an underhand manner
devise a system or form a scheme for

example.tran: 有助于减少失业的方案

example.ex: The company was pouring around $30 million into the scheme.
example.tran: 该公司要向该计划注资约 3,000 万美元。

value.def: A scheme is a plan or arrangement involving many people which is made by a government or other organization.
value.tran: (政府或其他组织的)计划，方案，安排

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 program

example.ex: ...a quick money-making scheme to get us through the summer...
example.tran: 能够让我们撑过这夏天的快速赚钱之道

example.ex: They would first have to work out some scheme for getting the treasure out...
example.tran: 他们首先得想个法子把财宝取出来。

example.ex: Tourists can be vulnerable to scams and con schemes of all kinds.
example.tran: 游客们会很容易陷入各种形形色色的骗局。

value.def: A scheme is someone's plan for achieving something.

example.ex: The bride's family were scheming to prevent a wedding...
example.tran: 新娘家人正密谋阻止婚礼。

example.ex: They claimed that their opponents were scheming against them...
example.tran: 他们声称对手正在算计他们。

example.ex: You're a scheming little devil, aren't you?
example.tran: 你是个耍阴谋诡计的小魔鬼，对不对？

value.def: If you say that people are scheming, you mean that they are making secret plans in order to gain something for themselves.

example.ex: ...their favourite pastimes of scheming and gossiping.
example.tran: 她们最喜欢在一起交头接耳、说长道短来消磨时光

example.ex: He did not quite know how to place women in his scheme of things.
example.tran: 他不太清楚在自己的人生安排中应把女人摆在什么位置。

value.def: Someone's scheme of things is the way in which they think that things in their life should be organized.

example.ex: We realize that we are infinitely small within the scheme of things.
example.tran: 我们认识到在大千世界中我们极其渺小。

value.def: When people talk about the scheme of things or the grand scheme of things , they are referring to the way that everything in the world seems to be organized.

trans: 设计方案
方案设计阶；方案设计；初步设计
配色方案；配色；色彩方案；颜色方案；色彩设计

小规模试验计划
配线图，分配方式
庞氏骗局；老鼠会；非法集资

有限差分格式；有限差分法
调制方式；调制方案；调变架构；调变系统；调变方式
同 pension plan；退休金计划，养老金计划
金字塔骗局；非法传销；传销；老鼠会；金字塔计划
(尤指房间家具和装饰的)色彩设计，色彩搭配
隐式方案；隐式格式；差分格式
工作计划；施业规划
初步方案
管制计划协议；管制计划；管制协议；管制方案
评卷参考；评分方案；评分准则；评分标准
住宅建筑方案
原理图
